content: Hello, I have newly started using the HAPI FHIR dependency to manage Resource Models. My APIs return Bundle of resources and I dont want the null properties of the resource to be sent as response. But I am not able to annotate the Resource model using Jackson. Please help.

HAPI FHIR is not designed to be used with Jackson parsers.

This page shows how to use HAPI FHIR's parser/serializer: https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/model/parsers.html
@James Agnew Thanks a lot! That helps.
